message: Let's split it fairly, I'll give you 40%!
I think it's fairer to split it 60/40 in my favor, given that you'll keep all of your money while mine is worth 5% less each round. Let's get this done.
You wanted 60/40, I'll give you 45% - take it or leave it!
Let's be reasonable, Alice. We both lose money if we keep going, so let's split it down the middle and call it a day.
